Package me.lucyy.common.command

Class Command

java.lang.Object
me.lucyy.common.command.Command
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor, org.bukkit.command.TabCompleter
public class Command
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor, org.bukkit.command.TabCompleter
A root command that other subcommands stem from.

    • getUserSubcommandsMap

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Subcommand> getUserSubcommandsMap​(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
      Gets the subcommands a sender has permission to execute, as in getUserSubcommands(CommandSender), as a map where the key is the command name.
      Parameters:
      sender - the sender to check permissions against

    • getSubcommands

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSubcommands()
      Get all registered subcommand names.
      Returns:
      a list of the names of all registered subcommands

    • tabCompleteNames

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> tabCompleteNames​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns a list of player names starting with the input, case insensitive.
      Parameters:
      name - the partial name to check for
      Returns:
      a list of names that match. An empty list if none were found.
